name: Twelve Monkeys Kanzi #remix
description:
My take on 12 Monkey's Kanzi
Hope u like it :)
CAP Super Sweet is in such high % to mimic original even better, feel free to lower if needed :)

"This fusion of strawberries, watermelon and a hint of kiwi is sure to please the most discerning fruit connoisseur. Kanzi is a mouthwatering fruit concoction that is sure to salivate any palate" - Sourced from Twelve Monkeys Vapor Co. Website
author: KaptenUtbrott

reviews.text: Just mixed it on a shake it pretty good love the little tang or partners it gives off. Was getting sick of my apples and s&c needed something a little different and I'm loving it.
Nice all day vape, not super sweet, just right.  Good job on this one.
